author: Noxix
name: BotBackup
install_msg: BotBackup cog loaded! Use `[p]backup create` to backup all configurations.
short: Backup and restore all bot configurations for easy migration
description: A comprehensive backup and restore system for Red bot configurations. Allows you to backup all cog configurations for every server and restore them with a single command, making bot migration seamless.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores backup files of bot configurations. These backups may contain server settings and user data from other cogs.
